Israel/Jacob/seed of Abraham. The Lord, who has been speaking to the nations, now addresses his covenant people.

I have chosen. The people of Israel were chosen to serve the Lord (Deut. 7:6; 26:18) and make his name known to all the world (66:19; 1 Kgs. 8:43).

my friend. Abraham was called "Friend of God" (James 2:23) because of his faith and obedience.
